title: This Month's GTA+ Benefits
headline: This Month's GTA+ Benefits
content:
In addition to the recurring monthly GTA$500,000 deposit directly into your Maze Bank account, GTA+ members who've signed up for this month (October 12 - November 8) will also receive:

- The new Albany Brigham
- The Agency Armory upgrade
- Exclusive clothing
- 2X Rewards on Judgement Day and Halloween Deathmatches
- And more

Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel any time. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
